content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: Low volatility (20-day XU100 14.4%) with full breadth (8/8 sectors positive), signalling broad cyclical rally.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Energy & Chemicals leading: GUBRF (1W: +24.20% | 1M: +45.45%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +10.87% | 1M: +37.84%) ABOVE TREND. Construction & REIT and Holding also strong: ENKAI (1W: +13.11% | 1M: +17.73%) ABOVE TREND, SAHOL (1W: +11.18% | 1M: +25.55%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Banking and Transportation lag relatively: GARAN (1W: -0.46% | 1M: +6.29%) CORRECTION, YKBNK (1W: -2.02% | 1M: +5.76%) CORRECTION, PGSUS (1W: -0.65% | 1M: +1.79%) CORRECTION; Technology has a weak outlier KONTR (1W: -0.21% | 1M: -15.00%) BELOW TREND.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
GUBRF (1W: +24.20% | 1M: +45.45%) ABOVE TREND, ENKAI (1W: +13.11% | 1M: +17.73%) ABOVE TREND, TKFEN (1W: +12.46% | 1M: +11.21%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +12.37% | 1M: +35.21%) ABOVE TREND, SAHOL (1W: +11.18% | 1M: +25.55%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
KONTR (1W: -0.21% | 1M: -15.00%) BELOW TREND, MGROS (1W: -0.24% | 1M: +19.38%) CORRECTION, GARAN (1W: -0.46% | 1M: +6.29%) CORRECTION, PGSUS (1W: -0.65% | 1M: +1.79%) CORRECTION, YKBNK (1W: -2.02% | 1M: +5.76%) CORRECTION.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Top 1W movers: GUBRF (1W: +24.20% | 1M: +45.45%) ABOVE TREND, ENKAI (1W: +13.11% | 1M: +17.73%) ABOVE TREND, TKFEN (1W: +12.46% | 1M: +11.21%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +12.37% | 1M: +35.21%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +10.87% | 1M: +37.84%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking is participating but underperforming cyclicals; AKBNK (1W: +6.20% | 1M: +22.00%) ABOVE TREND offers leadership, while GARAN (1W: -0.46% | 1M: +6.29%) CORRECTION and YKBNK (1W: -2.02% | 1M: +5.76%) CORRECTION warrant caution on short-term flow.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry and autos are strong: EREGL (1W: +7.64% | 1M: +18.02%) ABOVE TREND, FROTO (1W: +6.98% | 1M: +21.14%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +9.99% | 1M: +26.67%) ABOVE TREND; defense/name-specifics like ASELS (1W: +1.40% | 1M: +39.14%) ABOVE TREND remain buy-on-weakness stories.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Sector is the market leader with broad rallies: TUPRS (1W: +9.54% | 1M: +32.28%) ABOVE TREND, GUBRF (1W: +24.20% | 1M: +45.45%) ABOVE TREND and TRMET (1W: +10.87% | 1M: +37.84%) ABOVE TREND benefit from oil/input price tailwinds and strong quant signals.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk‑on stance: overweight Energy & Chemicals, Construction and Retail cyclicals; trim or selectively hedge positions in short‑lived momentum names after strong runs and hold high-quality banks (AKBNK, ISCTR) for beta management.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
GUBRF (1W: +24.20% | 1M: +45.45%) ABOVE TREND for continuation or profit-taking, TUPRS (1W: +9.54% | 1M: +32.28%) ABOVE TREND on oil moves, TCELL (1W: +9.86% | 1M: +23.36%) ABOVE TREND for sector flows, ENKAI (1W: +13.11% | 1M: +17.73%) ABOVE TREND for construction momentum.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Energy & Chemicals for commodity-driven extensions, Construction & REIT for domestic cyclical strength, Retail & Food for consumer demand resilience.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Monitor XU100 near recent breakout and maintain stops on winners; key catalysts are domestic macro (inflation and CBRT communications), Q4 earnings flow, and global risk appetite/oil price moves that will steer Energy and Industrial performance.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
RISK‑ON market with low volatility and unanimous sector participation; Energy & Chemicals, Construction and Retail lead. Opportunities in cyclicals; watch for profit-taking in extreme single-stock rallies and macro/currency or earnings surprises that could rapidly change sentiment.
